data.name: Idle Campaign
data.detailed_description:
Explore through Idle Campaign! A DnD inspired idle / incremental game about slaughtering enemies with a group of heroes. Once you finish one campaign you start another.
  • Battle with three hero pieces!
  • Find a vast variety of armor drops and equip your three heroes, while managing your inventory.
  • Fight & Research over 150 enemies to get permanent extra damage and health bonuses.
  • Spend gold in the various town building to upgrade your damage, health, utility, gold drops, and more!
  • Find Relics to get special permanent bonuses through the Reliquary.
  • Rebirth when you start to slow down to earn Celestial Energy and spend it for permanent upgrades.
  • Find collectibles for the Dungeon Slime to give you permanent rewards.
  • Explore unique zones during your campaigns.
  • Do daily quests, claim daily login rewards.
  • Use the spinning wheels to earn fun bonuses.
  • And More!
